verbose_text: In addition, a high expression of NDRG1 may promote the progression of lung squamous cell carcinoma by upregulating vascular endothelial growth factor-A and interleukin-8 / C-X-C-motif chemokine ligand 8.
evidence: NDRG1 may promote the progression of lung squamous cell carcinoma by upregulating vascular endothelial growth factor-A and interleukin-8/C-X-C-motif
